arm_group.description: Cohort will include 4 HVs/completers who will receive a single 20 mg dose of PF-02545920.
Cohort 2 will include 4 HVs/completers who will receive a single dose of PF-02545920. The dose will be selected based on the results obtained for Cohort 1.

Cohort 3 will include 4 HVs/completers who will receive a single dose of PF-02545920. The dose will be selected based on the results obtained for Cohort 1.
Dose options range from 30 mg to 10 mg, 5 mg, 2mg, 1 mg. This cohort is optional

brief_summary.textblock:
This Phase 1 study will evaluate PDE10 enzyme occupancy using Positron Emission Tomography
      after a single dose of PF-02545920 in Healthy male volunteers.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate The PDE10 Enzyme Occupancy Following A Single Dose Of PF-02545920 In Healthy Male Volunteers

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  healthy male volunteers

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  History of orthostatic hypotension

          -  History of prior radiation exposure for research purposes, or radiation therapy

intervention.description: Subject will receive a single dose of 20 mg PF-02545920.

The dose will be selected based on the results obtained for Cohort 1. Dose options range from 30 mg to 10 mg, 5 mg, 2mg, 1 mg.
This cohort is optional.
The dose will be selected based on the results obtained for Cohort 1 and cohort 2.

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.

clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Open-Label Adaptive Design Study To Evaluate PDE10 Enzyme Occupancy As Measured By Positron Emission Tomography (PET) Following Single Oral Dose Administration Of PF-02545920 In Healthy Male Subjects

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.description: Using Positron Emission Tomography and a radiotracer (MNI-659) for PF-02545920, the central PDE10A enzyme occupancy values will be measured in the striatum at different single oral doses of PF-02545920.
primary_outcome.measure: Central PDE10A enzyme occupancy values in the striatum.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Using Positron Emission Tomography and a radiotracer (MNI-659) for PF-02545920, central PDE10A enzyme occupancy values in the globus pallidus, in the caudate and in the putamen be measured (separately) at different single oral doses of PF-02545920.
secondary_outcome.measure: Central PDE10A enzyme occupancy values in the globus pallidus, in the caudate and in the putamen (separately).

secondary_outcome.description: Cmax for serum PF-02545920 during the post-dose positron emission tomography (PET) scan.
Tmax for serum PF-02545920 during the post-dose positron emission tomography (PET) scan.
secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Tmax)

secondary_outcome.description: Average serum 02545920 during the post-dose positron emission tomography (PET) scan.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Non-Randomized, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Basic Science
